jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Work in .NET stack building API for mobile applications.
Migrated from older framework to modern .NET core in Docker/K8s.
Built backend for frontend to ensure API contracts with mobile applications.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Helped company pivot from older stack to modern Python/Flask microservices
Developed React web pages used to support over 2 million customers
Worked with designers and within design system to create user friendly pages
Lead trainings on Python for entire department of ~40 engineers
Helped architect template for company wide Python microservices used in more than 10 projects
Worked with Openshift for deployment of containerized applications

jobs.title: Programmer and DevOps
description: Automated the development environment with Docker and Python to decrease wasted dev time by more than 80%
Built internal Python and Bash tools to reduce repetitive tasks
Worked on a team supporting websites with over 8 million collective views per year

jobs.title: Teacher's Assistant
description: Assigned to Intro to Computer Programming
Ranked by students as a top assistant in facilitating student learning amongst 25 total assistants
